item.title: Make a JWT Based Authentication Service in 10 Minutes in Django
item.description: Let us say, you need an authentication service in a rush, which needs to be cutting edge and uses JWT based authentication. Or you need a stand alone authentication service to be plugged in with other microservices. Do not worry, you can create one in 10 minutes. All you need to have is Python and Docker installed in your machine.
